title: The figure below shows a circuit composed of tw...

content.description: The figure below shows a circuit composed of two logic gates. The output of the circuit is true.
content.question: Which of the following is a true statement about input A?

choices.label: Input A can be either true or false.
There is no possible value of input A that will cause the circuit to have the output true.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
